title: I voted for remake and I recived a LeaverBuster???
body:
Hi!
So as u can see the title...Heimedinger was afk so i started a vote for remake...becouse it's dumb to play without a player and lose becouse of him...later I recived a LeaveBuster I don't know why...mby becouse I waited in the base until the vote ends...now I need to wait 20min becouse I was not the one who is afk...Riot can u do something?

replies.body:
The [/Remake System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) flags any player that is inactive for 90 seconds during the first 3 minutes of the match. This means that if you're AFK because someone didn't connect, you'll also be flagged. This is why it's a good idea to continue to play the game normally, especially because the player who didn't connect would come back before the remake happens.

Let me know if you have any questions.
